scripts.circle: lerna bootstrap && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.watch: node-sass --precision 9 --output-style expanded -w --include-path node_modules/ --include-path packages/sky-toolkit-core/node_modules/ --include-path packages/sky-toolkit-ui/node_modules/ build.scss build/toolkit.css
scripts.build: node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --include-path packages/sky-toolkit-core/node_modules/ --include-path packages/sky-toolkit-ui/node_modules/ --precision 9 build.scss > build/toolkit.css
scripts.dist:toolkit-core: node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --include-path packages/sky-toolkit-core/node_modules/ --precision 9 packages/sky-toolkit-core/_all.scss > build/toolkit-core.css --output-style compressed
scripts.dist: npm run dist:toolkit-core && npm run dist:toolkit
scripts.test:toolkit-core: cd packages/sky-toolkit-core && npm run test && cd -
scripts.test:toolkit-ui: cd packages/sky-toolkit-ui && npm run test && cd -
scripts.test: npm run test:toolkit-core && npm run test:toolkit-ui
